amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow companies to appeal their economic harm protests directly to the Export-Import Bank Board of Directors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 23 printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to the Senate amendment to the text to allow companies to appeal their economic harm protest directly to the Export-Import Bank Board of Directors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A082) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 298 (Roll no. 616).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Westmoreland amendment (A082) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 298 (Roll no. 616).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A082) offered by Mr. Westmoreland.
